subject: re:Best rates on medication, shipping worldwide
body:
Dear customer.
Various medical associations warn us about the growing problem of drug falsification. If you want to know how to avoid being sold fake medications, red this letter to the end.
A pass into your new healthy life can cost less than you think. Try CanadianPharmacy #1 licensed Canadian Web pharmacy. Purchase your medications from CanadianPharmacy and save large with our weekly specials and discount offers. Our prices and quality are the best on the Web.
Don't look for prices lower than those at CanadianPharmacy anything that is cheaper is a fake.
Yours faithfully,Bob Ybarra
